group_1.textRight: There you are, Ebony.
Today…I am asking for something that@only you alone can do.
It is an esteemed job related to@the royal family.
The arts of war and life, the affairs of@man and the legends of gods…
We have taught you all this and more.
Now you have been called upon to put@these lessons to use.

group_1.textLeft: I-I understand…! I shall do as you ask!

group_1.textRight: My my, we can certainly rely on you…!@*Chuckle*
…What we are asking you to do…
…is to form a contract with God.

group_1.textLeft: A contract…with God…?@Did I hear that correctly…?

group_1.textRight: It is indeed for women of the Met Clan.
That contract is what binds you@to the royal family.
…I'm certain you must find my words@unconvincing.
Well, it's not surprising…
But all of it is true. This contract is our@secret ritual― the crux of our clan.
For ages now, our clan has had a young woman form@a contract with our god to serve the royal family.
All of us support the girl, and the girl@serves the royal family.
In return, the royal family grants@protection to our clan.
That is how we have survived.
And now you will be the one to serve@the pharaoh herself…
A noble and sacred duty indeed.
Very good. I'm as proud as you are.
And with that…the ceremony will be@carried out the day after tomorrow.
If the god descends and recognizes you,@the contract will be formed.

group_1.textLeft: …Speaking of which, what is expected@of me during the ceremony?

group_1.textRight: First, you will heed the words spoken@to you by the god.
And…this is what's crucial…
The god will grant you a wish for whatever@it is you desire.
Yes. And you will say…
"For the glory of Queen Cleopatra."

group_1.textLeft: For the pharaoh… Is that the rule?

group_1.textRight: Yes. It is the rule.
You see, Ebony, this is a ritual.
It is a time-honored rite.
There are rules to it, and they must be@followed exactly.
…Am I clear?
Finally, by completing this ritual, you will be@bestowed with extraordinary power.
This power will be a boon to the royal family.
At the same time, however, you will be@put to the test.
You will be able to perceive the Evil Gods that bring@calamity and misfortune to the royal family.
Your destiny is to do battle with them.

group_1.textLeft: With gods…?! But…I am only human!

group_1.textRight: Hence why you are given this power―@so you can fight them.
Ebony… You are to fulfill this ritual@and gain power.
Use it to serve the royal family and defeat@the Evil Gods that lurk around them!

group_1.narration: At the time, I was simply filled with joy@that I would be able to meet a god and@show my devotion to the royal family.
I had no idea just what the ritual@would entail…
